game.name: Stick BMX Challenge
game.description:
Are you looking forward to riding a BMX bike on a hilly, forest trail? Stick BMX Challenge is an ultimate treat to all your BMX bike riding needs. You can choose the track you want to ride your bike and get ready to enjoy the never-ending thrilling and adventurous experience. In this free online racing game, you will have a chance to check your cycling and adventurous skills. You are advised to use the mouse to control your bicycle.?

In this cool game for boys, you have to jump like a hip-hop ball on your BMX bike. The better you will perform over the hill, the more score you will be able to get. Use your BMX bike and let yourself allow to go on a highly exciting outdoor challenge. Do not let yourself down while climbing over the steep hills and give your best while performing front flips and backflips in order to score better at the end of each level of this most popular Cycle games.?

A good performance throughout the game is sure to promote you to the next level in this exclusively-designed racing game. When you play this bicycle game in your browser, you will get a chance to enjoy the improved graphics and easy-to-operate bicycle game. In order to drive your bike bicycle forward and brake, you can use Arrow up and down. You can also lean your bike using the left and right arrow keys. Perform the requirements to clear each level while riding your bike over the hills. Good luck with a fun-filled and awesome bike riding experience!
